about: Hey you, thank you for using my app :) Hopefully you enjoy it and could give me some feedback for improvement, which is much appreciated. I am trying my best to constantly improving this app in my free time. But as I do not have always that much time / motivation to code after I coded a full working day, updates may be delayed. I hope you understand this. {'\n'} {'\n'} Feel free to support me, if you like this app :) Thank you alot!

comingSoon.session: Playing with your friends will be coming soon...
